title: Must Watch! Fully functioning LEGO bicycle will blow your mind
content:
We’ve seen a lot of clever bicycle creations and stop-motion animations over the years, but nothing like this fully functional, working bicycle from builder SleepyCow. Submitted to the LEGO Ideas website as a concept for a future set, it has working brakes, drivetrain, kickstand, and even a rear rack with clamp. And a whole lot […]

The post Must Watch! Fully functioning LEGO bicycle will blow your mind appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
